upload.description: Click here to upload a picture from your library or just drag and drop

webcam.description: Click here to take a picture with your webcam or phone

imageResized.title: Image resized
imageResized.text: Your image exceeds the maximum size of ${maxMegaPixels} megapixels and has therefore been resized to ${width}x${height} pixels.

imageLoadFail.title: Failed to load image
imageLoadFail.text: Failed to load the image at ${path}

webcamNotSupported.title: Webcam not supported
webcamNotSupported.text: The webcam feature is not supported by your browser.

renderingError.title: Error while rendering
renderingError.text: An error has occurred while rendering the image.

context_lost.title: An error has occurred
context_lost.text: Your browser took too long to render the image. Please try applying less operations.

context_lost_limit.title: An error has occurred
context_lost_limit.text: Your browser failed multiple times while rendering the image.
